title: Bartdude
author: Bartdude
created_time: August 28, 2023, 02:51:04 PMLast edit: August 28, 2023, 05:52:18 PM by Bartdude
content: Hii have an old wallet MultiBit classic that have mined bitcoin but when i go in the address i not see any bitcoinwhen i open MultiBit classic i found 67 bitcoin that i mined any helpthank you

comments.author: paid2
comments.body: You should post your question in a more active section of the forum, I think that as this section is in the archival, you're likely to get very little visibility.Otherwise, have you checked the balance of your address on an explorer?

comments.author: NeuroticFish
comments.body: Quote from: Bartdude on August 28, 2023, 02:51:04 PMany helpMultiBit classic used to have the option to export the private key in clear, I've done that myself many years ago.However, if you've tried that address on a block explorer and it's empty, you may have moved your coins elsewhere.As said, if you want help, ask in a place that's not under Archival and give more details, maybe the address (it's safe, but it's bad move for privacy) for look up.

comments.author: btc2doge
comments.body: you may post some screenshot of the wallet you used. if you really have btc on the wallet, there should be balance when you check the address via blockchain.
